attributes.action: stop the use of taxpayers money to fund a farewell party for Lord Levy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lord Levy is on police bail and may yet be convicted of a criminal offence.  He is not the sort of person that should have taxpayer pounds expended on his behalf for a farewell party.  He has paid less that GBP6000.00 in taxes each year for the last decade.  Let him fund his own farewell party.
